# Model

```{r}
model <- lm(WEIGHT ~ HRSLEEP + worfreq_binary + HRSLEEP*worfreq_binary + AGE + BMI + activity_score + 
            SEX + income_high + income_middle + health_binary + race_Asian + race_black + race_na)

summary(model)
```
